title: Bookworm
description:
A book management website. 
 You can search books with GoogleBooksAPI, show current New York Times best sellers, add and delete books in your library, customize user profile page, etc.

title: Roguelike
description: A small roguelike game made in Svelte. In this project I tried to better my understanding of the <canvas> element and what it could do. I also challenged myself to learn some pixel art basics and made all the sprites on my own.

title: Todo App
description: A simple todo list made with svelte. You can add new tasks, complete and delete them.
